title: Maxim Van Gils Bounces Back After Bessèges Crash, but Red Bull Boss Sounds Alarm: ‘Racing’s Not a Video Game’
content:
Van Gils returns at Ruta del Sol, but Red Bull doesn't want one its top riders KO'd over rider safety: 'No rider wants to end up in a ditch with broken bones.'

Read the full article at Maxim Van Gils Bounces Back After Bessèges Crash, but Red Bull Boss Sounds Alarm: ‘Racing’s Not a Video Game’ on Velo.
author: ahood
